item.trans: n. 援助；帮助；助手；帮助者 vt. 援助；帮助；有助于 vi. 帮助 同义词:assistance, friend, hand, help, boost, facilitate, bolster up, lend a hand, to help to aid someone in his work在工作上帮助某人
vi. 喘息；渴望；气喘吁吁地说出某事 vt. 气喘 n. 气喘；喘息；喷气声 同义词:rare, aspire, asthma, wheeziness The dog was panting because of the hot weather.因为天热这只狗不停地喘气。
vt. 欣赏；感激；领会；鉴别 vi. 增值；涨价 同义词:enjoy, see, grasp, value added, rise in price to appreciate good wine品尝好酒
n. 说谎的人 A boaster and liar are all one .爱吹牛的人和骗子都是一丘之貉。
vt. 教育；培养；训练 vi. 教育；训练 同义词:cultivate, school, rear, discipline, coach, drill, bring up to educate the young generation教育年轻一代
n. 所有权；物主身份 同义词:property, droit Stock represents shares of ownership in a company .股票代表一个公司所有权的股份。
n. 股份，股票；库存；血统；树干 adj. 存货的，常备的；平凡的 vt. 进货；备有；装把手于… vi. 囤积；办货；出新芽 同义词:birth, blood, stem, ordinary, mediocre, be furnished with, corner I stocked many facial tissues in my shop.我的店里有大量面巾纸的存货。
n. 运输；运输机；狂喜；流放犯 vt. 运输；流放；使狂喜 同义词:carriage, traffic, conveyance, convey, to freight A special bus transported the tourists from the airport to a hotel.一辆专车把游客们由机场送到一家旅馆。
adv. 向前，向外；自…以后 同义词:to, ahead, along, forwards, front I saw everything about me surge forth and germinate .我看见我周围的万物汹涌向前，欣欣向荣。
vt. 通知；告诉；报告 vi. 告发；告密 同义词:message, bring in on, tell on, blow the whistle to inform somebody of his arrival通知某人他的到达
n. 邀请；引诱 同义词:calling, temptation Yes , I know . I appreciate your invitation .是的，我知道，感谢你的邀请。
adj. 深思的；体贴的；关切的 同义词:considerate Hence it was a treat to her to find herself again the object of thoughtful care .因此，当她发现自己又成为悉心照料的对象时，感到实在是一件难得的乐事。
adj. 英雄的；英勇的；记叙英雄及其事迹的；夸张的 n. 史诗；英勇行为 同义词:bold, gallant, epic poetry, epos His heroic saves saw Germany though to the Final in 2002 World Cup .2002年世界杯上，他英勇的救球将德国队送进了决赛。
vt. 观察；遵守；说；注意到；评论 vi. 观察；说；注意到；评论 同义词:watch, quo, tell, talk, respect, look into, take stock of It was observed by none.没有人看见这件事。
adj. 保守的 n. 保守派，守旧者 同义词:standpat, backward-looking, old guard, pontificator Even so , the report says the prediction of substantial damage by 2030 is conservative .虽然如此，报告还指出，对2030年破坏程度的预测是保守的。
adj. 独特的，稀罕的；[数] 唯一的，独一无二的 n. 独一无二的人或物 同义词:distinct, individual, one, sole, picturesque Sometimes you can be unique for your own good .有时候为了自己的利益，你可以与众不同。
adj. 年轻的 同义词:young, baby-doll And his youthful optimism could work at home too .他的年青和乐观对其家乡也起作用。

adj. 无知的；愚昧的 同义词:dark, empty, innocent If so , ignorant investor may pick and choose at random , knowing that her selections will be priced as keenly as any others .如果是这样的话，无知的投资人就可以随机选取，因为她知道自己所选资产的价格会和其他资产一样公道。
n. 杂志；弹药库；胶卷盒 同义词:journal, mags This magazine will discontinue .这家杂志将停刊。
n. 超过，超额；过度，过量；无节制 adj. 额外的，过量的；附加的 同义词:immoderation, exorbitance, additional, added, attached, extra, plus It would export excess supply , instead .相反，它将输出过度的供应。
n. 宿舍，学生宿舍 adj. 住宅区的 同义词:lodging house, student hostel, uptown The dormitory was aired in the morning .早晨，宿舍通过风。

adj. 幸运的；侥幸的；吉祥的；带来幸运的 同义词:lucky, providential His father told Raul Gonzalez Blanco that he would be a curator and that one day , if he were fortunate , he would play football for Atletico Madrid.父亲告诉劳尔*萨雷斯*兰科，他将会成为一个足球运动员，如果幸运的话，也许有一天他可以入选马德里竞技队。
n. 火药；有烟火药 同义词:powder Gunpowder also sped up the slow process of digging up stones .黑火药还加快了缓慢的采石进程。
vt. 修正；复习；校订 vi. 修订；校订；复习功课 n. 修订；校订 同义词:update, edit, to amend, recension, emendation The English textbooks for middle schools have been completely revised.中学的英语教科书已经全部被修订过。
n. 治疗，疗法；处理；对待 同义词:therapy, transactions, settlement, disposal, computing Treatment depends on the kind of fracture .治疗方案取决于骨折的类型。
adj. 通常的，惯例的；平常的 同义词:traditional, conventional, common, ordinary, regulation For such a series it is usual to design a standard margin .对于这种系列图幅，通常是设计一种标准图廓。
n. 目的；用途；意志 vt. 决心；企图；打算 同义词:goals, intention, sake, objective, use, propose, think We purpose another trial.我们打算再试一下。
adj. 快速的，敏捷的 n. 舰队；港湾；小河 vi. 飞逝；疾驰；掠过 vt. 消磨 同义词:fast, sudden, sharp, fly, quick, marine, navarchy, brush, fly by, spend, while away Our own fleet will do the transport .我们自己的船队将负责运输。
n. 部长；大臣；牧师 vi. 执行牧师职务；辅助或伺候某人 同义词:secretary, priest to minister to a sick man's wants照料病人
n. 婚礼，婚宴；结婚；结合 v. 与…结婚（wed的ing形式） 同义词:marriage, combination, coupling, bond, join She will wed her daughter to a rich man.她准备把女儿嫁给有钱人。
vi. 集中；浓缩；全神贯注；聚集 vt. 集中；浓缩 n. 浓缩，精选；浓缩液 同义词:focus, collect, mass, crowd, centre, localise, compression, solidification You must concentrate all your energies on the study of English.你必须集中全力学习英语。
n. 城堡；象棋中的车 vt. 置…于城堡中；筑城堡防御 同义词:alcazar, chateau His whole family was castled up in at our country retreat.他的全家都安居于我们的乡村别墅中。
vt. 出席；上（大学等）；照料；招待；陪伴 vi. 出席；致力于；照料；照顾 同义词:present oneself, invite, serve, board, mind, present oneself, nurse to attend a concert去听音乐会
adj. 下流的；肮脏的；脾气不好的；险恶的 n. 令人不快的事物 性的吸引力 同义词:blue, dirty Unfortunately for you, it might stain your shirt and leave behind a nasty smell .不幸的是这些汗水会弄脏你的衣服，也会留下难闻的气味。
vi. 听，倾听；听从，听信 n. 听，倾听 同义词:hear, hark, ear She likes to listen to music in her spare time.她喜欢在余暇时间听音乐。

n. 纤维；纤维制品 同义词:fiber, funicle So once the fibre is drawn the researchers apply a very high electric field to it, causing the molecules to align as the fibre cools .因此，一旦选出合适的纤维材料，研究者们就会将其放于高电场中，让纤维分子在其冷却过程中形成一致性。
n. 锈；生锈；[植保] 锈病 vt. 使生锈；腐蚀 vi. 生锈；成铁锈色；变迟钝 同义词:patination, eat, cauterize, dull Iron exposed to damp air will rust.放在空气潮湿地方的铁会生锈。
adj. 进步的；先进的 n. 改革论者；进步分子 同义词:advanced, ascensive The country 's constitution , adopted in 1996 , is one of the most progressive in the world .南非在1996年颁布实施的国家宪法是世界上最进步的宪法之一。
vi. 作战；参加竞选；参加活动 n. 运动；活动；战役 同义词:war, battle, movement, activity, exercise, sport, battle We are campaigning for equal rights for women.我们正在开展妇女拥有平等权利的运动。
n. 范围；余地；视野；眼界；导弹射程 vt. 审视 同义词:extent, boundary, region, spectrum, territory, range, area Two elements in the same scope which have same name should have same type .同一作用域内名称相同的两个元素应具有相同的类型。

adj. 活的；现存的；活跃的；逼真的 n. 生活；生存；生计 v. 生活；居住（live的ing形式）；度过 同义词:realistic, existing, active, excited, going, life, existence, livelihood, keep, subsistence, spending, dwelling She outlived her son by many years.她比她儿子还多活了好几年。
n. 设施；设备；容易；灵巧 同义词:equipment, furniture, establishment, plant, fixture Might stringing things together be a core facility of the brain ?串连事物的本领会是我们脑部的核心技能吗？
n. 旋转；循环，轮流 同义词:revolution, rolling, circulation, turning, cycle The workers in this workshop do day and night shifts in weekly rotation .这个车间的工人上白班和上夜班每周轮换一次。
adv. 些微地，轻微地；纤细地 We shouldn't slight anybody even if he's a nobody.我们不应该轻视任何人，即使他是一个小人物。
adv. 主要地；通常；多半地 同义词:mainly, basically, largely, usually, generally, primarily But people are mostly living on borrowed time as well as borrowed money .但大多数人还是依靠着“借来的钱”活在“借来的时间”里。
n. [管理] 履历；个人简历；摘要 vt. 重新开始；重新获得 vi. 再开始 同义词:bio, abstract, brief, summary, record, recover, start over Will you please resume your seat?请您重新坐下，好吗?
n. 描述，描写；类型；说明书 同义词:presentation, type, style, characterization This simple example is a pretty good description of how evolution works .这个简单的例子是进化发生的一个非常好的描述。
n. 夜晚，晚上；黑暗，黑夜 adj. 夜晚的，夜间的 同义词:evening, nocte, vesperal A bad day never has a good night .糟糕的一天也不会有美好的夜晚。
n. 协议；同意，一致 同义词:accordance, protocol, unity, identity, keeping We have not signed any agreement .我们没有签署任何协议。
n. 社会主义 同义词:social justice, social democracy Does this run counter to the principles of socialism ?这样做是否违反社会主义的原则呢？
n. 英式足球，足球 同义词:association football, center forward Some people say that our weakness in soccer is a matter of money .有人说我们足球踢的差，是因为存在一些关于钱的困难。
n. 番茄，西红柿 同义词:tamarillo Would you like tomato soup ?你喜欢喝蕃茄汤吗？

n. 发展；前进；增长；预付款 vt. 提出；预付；使……前进；将……提前 vi. 前进；进展；上涨 adj. 预先的；先行的 同义词:development, growth, making, progress, increase, introduce, present, prefer, file, put in, go ahead, move ahead, up-front, prevenient The general advanced his troops to the new position.将军挥师前进到新阵地。
n. 交通；运输；贸易；[通信] 通信量 vt. 用…作交换；在…通行 vi. 交易，买卖 同义词:transportation, commerce, trade, carriage, exchange, trade in to traffic in guns买卖枪炮
n. 手指；指针，指状物 vt. 伸出；用手指拨弄 vi. 用指触摸；拨弄 同义词:index, pointer, extend, reach out to finger a piece of cloth揉搓一块布
adj. 恰好是，正是；甚至；十足的；特有的 adv. 非常，很；完全 同义词:typical, characteristic, proper, own, badly, extremely, greatly, highly, too So , as you can see , he was a very important person .由此你们可以看到，他是一个非常重要的人物。
adv. 很好地；充分地；满意地；适当地 adj. 良好的；健康的；适宜的 n. 井；源泉 同义词:fully, properly, fine, adequately, wide, healthy, favorable, robust, fine, fit, principle, fountain I felt tears well up in my eyes.我感到眼泪涌出我的双眼。
vt. 保证，确保；使安全 同义词:undertake, assure, insure I cannot ensure his being on time.我不能保证他会准时。
n. 学习；学问 v. 学习（learn的现在分词） 同义词:knowledge, study, letter, studying I loved learning .我喜欢学习。
adj. 不变的；恒定的；经常的 n. [数] 常数；恒量 同义词:permanent, steady, invariable They face a constant battle to protect pockets of high profits and have few chances to grow .他们面临一场保护高额利润口袋持久的战斗，这些利润很少有机会增加。
n. 奶制品；乳牛；制酪场；乳品店；牛奶及乳品业 adj. 乳品的；牛奶的；牛奶制的；产乳的 同义词:milker, milking cow, milky Milk , butter , and cheese are shipped here from the dairy farms .牛奶、黄油和奶酪都是各个制酪场运到这里来的。
vt. 揭露，揭发；使曝光；显示 同义词:reveal, prove, make clear, disclose to expose one's character to attack使自己的品质受到攻击
adj. 拉丁语的；拉丁人的 n. 拉丁语；拉丁人 That is good news for Latin America , and especially for its poor .对拉丁美洲来说这是个好消息，尤其是对那里的穷人。
n. 先令 同义词:schelling, schilling, twelvepence Mr Hill : shilling each .希尔先生：每包一先令。
adj. 暂时的，临时的 n. 临时工，临时雇员 同义词:extraordinary, odd, interim, super, casual laborer In the long view , ecologies are temporary networks .长远来看，生态群是临时性的网络。
n. 珍珠；珍珠色；杰出者；珍品 adj. 镶珍珠的；珍珠状的 vi. 采珍珠；成珍珠状 vt. 使成珠状；用珍珠装饰；使呈珍珠色 同义词:treasure, perla, perlitic, impearl Sweat pearled his forehead.他额上满是汗珠。

adj. 向外的；外面的；公开的；外服的；肉体的 adv. 向外（等于outwards）；在外；显而易见地 n. 外表；外面；物质世界 同义词:outer, outside, external, material, open, forth, out, person, external, garment, without As it's released , they expel air from their lungs to blow the outward .正因为是释放出的，它们从肺中排出了空气从而向外吹出了毒液。
n. 承租人；房客；佃户；居住者 vt. 租借（常用于被动语态） 同义词:lessee, renter, rent The house is tenanted by two Chinese students.这所房屋由两个中国学生租住。
n. 副词 adj. 副词的 You should run on an adverb to the verb .你应在这动词后附加一个副词。
vi. 呼吁，恳求；上诉；诉诸，求助；有吸引力，迎合爱好；（体育比赛中）诉诸裁判 n. 呼吁，请求；吸引力，感染力；上诉；诉诸裁判 vt. 将…上诉，对…上诉 同义词:attract, clamour for, asking, request, motion, charm to appeal a case to a higher tribunal把案件向高一级法院上诉
n. 广告，宣传 同义词:publicity, bill, propaganda, dissemination, drumbeating I wish to insert advertisement in your newspaper .我希望在你们的报纸上登一则广告。
n. 辐射；发光；放射物 同义词:irradiation, Geigers But , it really can absorb in radiation .但是，它真的能吸收辐射啊。
n. 国籍，国家；民族；部落 同义词:state, folk, people, soil Science has no nationality ; knowledge belongs to everyone .科学没有国界，知识属于每一个人。
adj. 特别喜爱的 n. 特别喜欢的人或事物 Waiting for my favourite show .等待我最喜爱的节目。
n. 铁锹，铲子 vt. 铲；把……弄实抹平 vi. 铲 同义词:rabbler, shool, shovel to spade the land挖地

vt. 发射（导弹、火箭等）；发起，发动；使…下水 vi. 开始；下水；起飞 n. 发射；发行，投放市场；下水；汽艇 同义词:release, send, project, drive, let go, proceed, start in, emission, shot, sending, projection, loose In 1970,China successfully lauched a man-made satellite.1970年，中国成功地发射了一颗人造卫星。
vi. 旋转；纺纱；吐丝；晕眩 vt. 使旋转；纺纱；编造；结网 n. 旋转；疾驰 同义词:wheel, circle, turn, swing, revolution, rotation, rolling, turning to spin yarn on the spinning wheel用手纺车纺棉纱
n. 定义；[物] 清晰度；解说 同义词:difinition, sharpness At the time , WHO said it would rewrite its pandemic definition to avoid announcing one.当时，世卫组织说，它将改写流感大流行的定义，回避了宣布大流行。

n. 贸易，商业 同义词:trade, traffic Especially in the prevailing political climate , they will be designed in order to strike political compromises rather than free up commerce .尤其是在当前主流政治气候下，它们的制定将是为了达成政治妥协而非让贸易自由化。

adj. 移民的；迁入的 n. 移民，侨民 同义词:emigratory, migration, transplantation An immigrant grandmother , for example , may well struggle to communicate with her American - born children .例如，一个移民祖母会筋疲力尽地与她的美国出生的孩子交流。
adj. 不必要的，不需要的；多余的，无用的 同义词:unnecessary, spare, useless, waste The only thing he could regret was his needless dread .他唯一觉得遗憾的，是自己不必要的恐惧。
vt. 在…上掘沟；把…开入沟里；丢弃 vi. 开沟；掘沟 n. 沟渠；壕沟 同义词:reject, slough off, furrow, conduit, sike The fortress was ditched in all around.要塞周围挖了壕沟。
adj. 复数的 n. 复数 同义词:complex numbers, complexor Words importing the singular only also include the plural and vice versa where the context requires .仅表明单数形式的词也包括复数含义，视合同上下文需要而定，反之亦然。
n. 边界；范围；分界线 同义词:region, extent, spectrum, territory, area The boundary particle theory " looks like " a theory of particles in the absence of gravity .边界上的粒子理论「看起来」像是一个不含重力的粒子理论。
adj. 大声的，高声的；不断的；喧吵的 adv. 大声地，高声地，响亮地 同义词:ceaseless, unceasing, aloud, ringingly Why do you play the TV loud ?你为什么把电视声音开得这么大。
vt. 拖累；拖拉；缓慢而吃力地行进 vi. 拖曳；缓慢而吃力地行进 n. 拖；拖累 同义词:cumber with, ball and chain, daggle, pull, tow We dragged the carpet out of the room.我们费力地把地毯拖出房间。

n. 潜能；可能性；[电] 电势 adj. 潜在的；可能的；势的 同义词:possibility, probability, feasibility, maybe, chance, feasible, possible, underlying, latent The greatest potential , however , is tied up in the housing market .然而最大的潜力，是房地产市场的不动用资金。
n. 智力；情报工作；情报机关；理解力 同义词:brain, mind, mentality, understanding, head This is ( a ) high level conference intelligence challenges .这是一个关于挑战的高水平会议。
n. 班轮，班机；衬垫；画线者 同义词:pad, airliner On the liner bound for New Amsterdam people are always filled with anticipation .在驶向新阿姆斯特丹的客 轮上，人们心里都满怀期 待。
adj. 难懂的，复杂的 同义词:involved, detailed, sophisticated, elusive You mustn’t complicate the problem by raising new issues.你千万不要提出新的争端使问题更加复杂化。
vt. 辞职；放弃；委托；使听从 vi. 辞职 n. 辞去职务 同义词:yield, desert, refer, quit, step down, quit to resign one's hope放弃希望
adj. 偶然的；临时的；特殊场合的 同义词:extraordinary, temporary, odd Fossil teeth , and the occasional skeleton , show that small mammals were common at this time .化石牙齿和偶尔发现的骨架显示小型哺乳动物在当时很普遍。

n. 幽默（等于humor）；诙谐 vt. 迁就；使满足 同义词:drollness, pleasantry, content, gratify You shouldn't write such obscene things to humour their dirty interests.你可不应该为迎合某些人的低级趣味而写这些乌七八糟的东西。

n. 盐；风趣，刺激性 adj. 咸水的；含盐的，咸味的；盐腌的；猥亵的 vt. 用盐腌；给…加盐；将盐撒在道路上使冰或雪融化 同义词:pungency, saliferous, brackish to salt the soup给汤加点盐

n. 食物；养料 同义词:diet, eating, nourishment She said the world produces enough food to feed everyone .她说世界生产足够的粮食给你每个人吃。
